mutants.code:
def calculate_statistics(numbers):
    if len(numbers) <= 10:
        print('Error: The list should contain at least 10 non-negative numbers.')
        return
    total = sum(numbers)
    average = total / len(numbers)
    maximum = max(numbers)
    minimum = min(numbers)
    print('Sum:', total)
    print('Average:', average)
    print('Maximum:', maximum)
    print('Minimum:', minimum)
